title: The Echo Park eviction | Today, Explained in 10
description:
The recent police crackdown on a tent camp in Los Angeles has left the city divided. One thing everyone agrees on is the dire need for lasting solutions to the growing homelessness crisis in the United States.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Echo Park eviction | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: Los Angeles moved some unhoused residents into hotel rooms, but advocates say that won't be enough to address the nation's looming mass evictions.
